Container: binhex-emby false MediaApp:Video MediaApp:Music MediaApp:Photos MediaServer:Video MediaServer:Music MediaServer:Photos ghcr.io/binhex/arch-emby https://github.com/binhex/arch-emby/pkgs/container/arch-emby bridge false --restart=alwaysys bash https://github.com/binhex/arch-emby https://github.com/binhex/documentation https://forums.unraid.net/topic/index.php?topic=46382.0/ https://https://emby.media/ Bringing all of your home videos, music, and photos together into one place has never been easier. Your personal Emby Server automatically converts and streams your media on-the-fly to play on any device. http://[IP]:[PORT:8096] https://raw.githubusercontent.com/binhex/docker-templates/master/binhex/emby.xml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/binhex/docker-templates/master/binhex/images/emby-icon.png If you appreciate my work, then please consider buying me a beer :D https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=MM5E27UX6AUU4 https://www.paypal.com/en_US/i/btn/btn_donate_SM.gif 1970-01-01
